src_original: yathā kathitaṃ cāryaratnameghe /  sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalāpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /  sa sanmārjanopalepanaṃ kurvan sarvasatvānām aprāsādikeryāpathavigamāya /
tgt_original: 若見如來制多形像，即持種種香華供養，願有情類離破戒香，得淨戒香猶如諸佛； 掃灑塗地，願諸有情威儀齊整；

src_original: prāsādikeryāpathasaṃpade ca pariṇāmayati /  sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 花蓋覆罩，願諸有情皆離熱惱；

src_original: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sa niṣkramann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 入僧住處，願諸有情皆入圓寂； 出僧住處，願諸有情皆出魔境； 見開僧門，便作是願： 『以出世智為諸有情啟未開門，皆令悟入。

src_original: sa pithad evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvānāṃ sarvāpāyadvārāṇi pidadhyāṃ /
tgt_original: 』若見關閉，願為有情關閉三有或四惡趣；

src_original: sa niṣīdann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 若得安坐，願諸有情坐菩提座；
若右脇臥，願諸有情皆證圓寂；

src_original: sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān vyutthāpayeyaṃ sarvakleśaparyutthānebhyaḥ /
tgt_original: 從坐臥起，願諸有情離諸起惑；
